scripts.aws-all: npm run aws-pkg && npm run aws-deploy && npm run aws-list-functions
scripts.aws-pkg: aws cloudformation package --template-file awsLambda/test.yaml --output-template-file awsLambda/serverless-output.yaml --s3-bucket test-codesmith-bucket1
scripts.aws-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file awsLambda/serverless-output.yaml --stack-name testApp --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
